text: The Argentine Football Association (; AFA) is the governing body of football in Argentina. The association was founded on 21 February 1893. It organizes the football league Primera Divisi√≥n and the Argentina national football team for men and women. It is based in Buenos Aires, the Argentine capital. title: Argentine Football Association
